author: Simon Difford
description: A Mojito made with aged rum and topped with champagne instead of soda water: more complex than the original.
name: Luxury Mojito
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE mint in glass with sugar and lime juice
Fill glass with crushed ice, add rum, Angostura and champagne, then stir
